document_data.name: Sunlords
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Sunlords''' were a prominent mercenary company operating in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]]. They were based in the city of [[Airspur (Chessenta)|Airspur]] in [[Chessenta]].

Around [[1357 DR]], they'd recently battled in [[Chondath]] and suffered heavy losses.
